item.title: COVIDâ€™s report of Itabira city
item.description: In this page I’ll try to explain to you how to built a simple script that generates a refreshed report basing on some spreadsheet. In this case, this file was used by Itabira’s health secretary. The project can be found here. Context Since the first cases of the covid’s in Itabira, the Health Secretary ordered to generate a report to show to the citiziens what was happenning and the current situation of the city daily.
